abstract: Kansas court rules against parts of state school funding law, saying it violates state constitution.
lead_paragraph: A district court panel in Kansas ruled on Friday that key parts of a new state law for financing public schools violated the state constitution.

headline.main: Kansas: Parts of School Funding Law Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Parts of School Funding Law Unconstitutional

snippet: A district court panel in Kansas ruled on Friday that key parts of a new state law for financing public schools violated the state constitution.
